name: Colby Estate Forest and Field Walk, Colby

ai.summary: A 6.9 km loop near Colby that blends shaded forest trails with open field paths for a moderate, scenery-rich walk. The route offers a mix of woodland and grassy sections, with gentle elevation changes and opportunities to spot local flora along the way, returning to Colby.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain including forest tracks, grassy field edges, and occasional mud after rainfall. Surfaces can be uneven with roots and small steps; expect shaded sections in woodland and open, sunny stretches in fields. Elevation changes are gentle to moderate, with several small ascents and descents.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for changeable UK weather: wear sturdy waterproof footwear and dress in layered clothing. Stay on marked paths and be mindful of gates and livestock in fields. Carry a map or GPS and a charged phone; tell someone your planned route and expected return time. Bring water and a small snack; exercise caution on wet or muddy sections.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing suitable for the season
Map or GPS device (or offline map on smartphone)
Sun protection (hat and sunscreen) in sunny conditions
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn offers the best conditions in the UK, with milder weather and daylight; winter walks are possible with proper footwear and waterproof clothing.

seo.meta_description: Discover a 6.9 km moderate hike through Colby Estate's forest and fields. This route combines woodland and open grassland near Colby, UK, with terrain notes, safety tips, and gear suggestions.
